verses.roman:
gopī-gaṇera śuddha-prema aiśvarya-jñāna-hīna
premete bhartsanā kare ei tāra cihna

synonyms: gopī-gaṇera—of the gopīs; śuddha-prema—unalloyed love; aiśvarya-jñāna-hīna—devoid of knowledge of opulences; premete—of pure love; bhartsanā—chastisement; kare—do; ei—this; tāra—of that; cihna—the symptom.
translation: "Obsessed with pure love, without knowledge of opulences, the gopīs sometimes chastised Kṛṣṇa. That is a symptom of pure ecstatic love.
